results.name: Inverse permutation to A114881.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of related permutations:
Other identities. For all n >= 1 the following holds:
a(A005408(n-1)) = A000217(n). [Maps odd numbers to triangular numbers.]
a(A006093(n)) = A000124(n-1). [Maps precedents of primes to central polygonal numbers.]
xref: Similar or related permutations: A209268, A249812.
Differs from A246274 for the first time at n=20, where a(20) = 14, while
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 15 2014
